snippet: Bill de Blasio campaigned as a critic of New York Police Department policies. Now he is trying to strike a delicate balance between supporting the police and delivering on promised reform.
abstract: News analysis; New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio, who campaigned as a critic of Police Department policies, is now trying to strike a delicate balance between supporting the police and delivering on promised reform; as frustrations grow over death of Eric Garner after being put in a police chokehold, de Blasio is finding that quelling an outcry can be much more difficult than leading one.
lead_paragraph: Bill de Blasio campaigned as a critic of New York Police Department policies. Now he is trying to strike a delicate balance between supporting the police and delivering on promised reform.

headline.main: Once Leader of Outcry, de Blasio Is Now Trying to Quell It
headline.print_headline: Once Leader of Outcry, Now Trying to Quell It
